title: Warning is shown in dev mode in Quarkus 2.8 / Â¿Windows?
body:
### Describe the bug

Today we are delivering a Quarkus Workshop and some attendees get a warning when using dev mode. I don't have much information about but it seems it was in Windows machine and maybe using mingw thingy

![unnamed](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1517153/163028144-7ead2c4f-64b5-4726-9bfc-f9bd69a10c04.png)
.

### Expected behavior

No warning should be shown? It's not blocker but it makes people ask things.

### Actual behavior

Shows a warning

### How to Reproduce?

I have not been able to reproduce it on my machine (Mac) but in other attendees with Windows found it.

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

_No response_

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

Quarkus 2.8.1

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

_No response_

### Additional information

_No response_
